ValidationRule.description: On a Content Studio project, when a Topic value of "Other (see Description)" is selected, there must be something in the Description field.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: RecordType.Id = "01230000000wS4x" && OR( ISBLANK(Completion_Date__c), Completion_Date__c >= DATEVALUE( "2018-01-01" ) ) && ISPICKVAL( Project_Stage__c , "Completed") && ISPICKVAL( Topic__c , "Other (see Description)") && OR( AND( LEN( Description_OtherTopic__c )<4, CONTAINS(LOWER(Description_OtherTopic__c), "tbd") /*To prevent them from just putting "TBD"*/ ), ISBLANK(Description_OtherTopic__c) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: A Description must be provided if the Topic is "Other (see Description)".
